articles.title: Tech View: Nifty base shifts to 19,200 from 19K. What traders should do next week - The Economic Times
articles.description: As far as levels are concerned, 19400-19300 is likely to cushion any short-term blip, while the sacrosanct support lies around the bullish gap of 19200. The next pitstop could be seen around 19650-19700 on an immediate basis, said Osho Krishan of Angel One.
